summary:
This is a updated version of my mod, Konahrik The Dragon Priest And Mask, it adds in Konahrik the lost Dragon Priest to claim his Mask back once you have removed it from its bust, and it also makes the Mask even better by adding the enchantments of every other mask too.
Also I did not copy this as this has not already been done, well if you add a
descriptionHtml:
[color=gold][size=9][u][i][b]Konahrik[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]
[color=black]
[size=4]Description[/size]
[size=2]This is a updated version of my mod, Konahrik The Dragon Priest And Mask, it adds in Konahrik the lost Dragon Priest to claim his Mask back once you have removed it from its bust, and it also makes the Mask even better by adding the enchantments of every other mask too.[/size]
[/color]
author: Enoomnai
